entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR C++ Client Bug #43964
  • Live preview Blazor #43963
  • [Blazor] NavigationManager.HistoryEntryState parameter binding with [SupplyParameterFromHistoryState] #43962
  • AuthorizeView should expose the results of the AuthorizeAsync call as a context variable. #43959
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-38013: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #43953
    Discussions
  • SignalR failing to send messages to client #43950
  • Can't remove attribute from SVG element #43949
    Backlog
  • Blazor Input Type Password Password Reveal #43945
    Backlog
  • Add support for retries with Polly #43942
  • Endpoint object serialisation overlooks a public field #43940
  • Blazor wasm application's Hot Reload fails when SignalR is enabled #43939
  • Problem with body parameters when using `WithOpenApi()` from `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` #43938
  • Perf regression: json_actix #43936
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #43935

Closed

  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR C# client #43389
    6.0.10
  • Improve TLS mismatch error messages/experience #27472
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem details JSON returned by developer exception page serializes request path as an object #43816
    7.0-rc2
  • Layouts nested using a folder hierarchy and _Imports files, not working as expected. #43906
  • Add NoVaryByHost to Output Caching #43891
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor InputText bind to int #43924
  • Adopt resource limit APIs in YARP #32040
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Svg Bug On Blazor With Rectangles #43858
  • src/security/samples/StaticFilesAuth always not working #43274
    8.0-preview1
  • Generic Layout Attribute #43893
  • Passing route containing dot(.) to JS function #43941
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes_dapper #43913
  • Perf regression: mvc #43915
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #43927

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Infer response metadata in RequestDelegateFactory #43961
    Servicing-consider, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Changing to use the non-generic WriteAsJsonAsync #43960
    area-web-frameworks
  • [7.0] Close connections on client cert failures #43958
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1991692 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43955
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] MSAL updates #43954
    area-blazor
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #43952
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.10
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #43951
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.30
  • [release/6.0] Stop building / testing on Ubuntu 18.04 #43947
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [SignalR] Unblock user callbacks when waiting for client result #43944
    area-signalr
  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in NavigateToLogin doc comments #43933
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [Backport] [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43882
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 6.0.10
  • [release/7.0] Stop building / testing on Ubuntu 18.04 #43948
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix `Path` and `Exception` content in the Problem Details Json #43848
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Add a JS initializer for the Blazor custom elements package #43809
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Backport localizations for UseProgramMain string #43803
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.10
  • [release/7.0] Tweak publishing to avoid clearing ItemsToPush during SB #43946
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix double dispatch on linux #43931
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Improve Output Caching public API #43892
    breaking-change, Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix endpoints in StaticFileAuth sample #43352
    area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0e0d9fe` to `c29315d` #43918
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43853
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Explains that AddJsonOptions will use web defaults #43921
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] [WebView] Avoid Base64 encoding because Json Serializer should do that #43923
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
